translation.text: The Joliet Eastern Avenue elevator is out of service. Customers can use the Station elevator to access the boarding platform. Updates will be provided.
The east end elevator at Joliet station is out of service. Customers can use the west end elevator as alternate boarding stations. Updates will be provided.
North Central Service train #107, scheduled to arrive Antioch at 5:05 p.m., is back on the move and is operating with an extensive delay due to  a mechanical failure involving a Union Pacific train.
Heritage Corridor Train 917 set to arrive Joliet at 5:56 pm is currently operating 15 to 25 minutes behind schedule due to a mechanical failure involving another train.
UPNW trains delayed up to 45 min

Union Pacific Northwest inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 45 minutes behind schedule due to a mechanical failure involving another train. Please visit metra.com for current delay information.(update)
UPW OB Delayed Up To 35 Min.
UPW outbound trains may be operating up to 35 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier mechanical failure. Please listen to platform announcements for the location of your train.
Heritage Corridor Train 919 set to arrive Joliet at 6:36 pm is currently operating 20 to 30 minutes behind schedule due to a mechanical failure involving another train.
The 115th/Kensington Elevator is back in service.
North Central Service outbound and inbounds trains may be operating with an extensive delay due to an earlier mechanical failure involving a Union Pacific train.
RID #305, scheduled to arrive Tinley-80th at 5:50pm, is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to earlier mechanical problems.
Metra Alert ME - Homewood East Side Construction Will Begin March 13

Beginning Monday, March 13, access to the Homewood Station from the east will be closed for station construction until Summer 2024.  Access to the boarding platform will be through the Park Avenue entrance ONLY (west side of tracks).

 

Beginning, Monday, March 6, the Pace bus stop will relocate from Harwood Avenue to Park Avenue.  Please allow additional time and use caution near the work zone.
Metra Alert BNSF - Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks.
Attention Berwyn Commuters: Starting July 5, 2023, Stanley Avenue will be under construction for approximately 14 weeks. Please use caution through the work zone and allow extra travel time.
Metra Alert ME - 79th street/Chatham Station Closure Beginning July 10 - Station Rebuild Project

The 79th street/Chatham station on the Metra Electric line will be closed beginning Monday, July 10 for approximately 7 months. During this time passengers can use 75th and 83rd street stations as alternatives. This is part of the Metra Electric Community initiative to transform multiple stations on the Metra Electric District. Once completed, stations will have enclosed ADA-accessible street-level entrances, lobbies with elevators, new stairs, headhouses, new composite deck platforms, new lighting, and signage.  For more information click here.
Metra Alert BNSF - Track Work Saturday 7/8 and Sunday 7/9. No stops at Westmont. Trains will operate on a Sunday schedule Saturday 7/8.

BNSF will operate a Sunday schedule on both Saturday, July 8, and Sunday, July 9, due to scheduled track work at the Westmont Station. BNSF will be replacing rail ties along the platform at Westmont. During this time, trains will not be making stops at the Westmont station on Saturday, July 8, and Sunday, July 9. Trains may incur delays up to 15 minutes. Click here for BNSF schedule information.
